name: igor822/laravel-doctrine-orm
description: A Doctrine ORM bridge for Laravel 5

suggest.fzaninotto/faker: Required to use the entity factory builder (~1.4).
suggest.laravel-doctrine/acl: to integrate Doctrine roles & permissions with Laravel's Authorization system (~1.0)
suggest.laravel-doctrine/extensions: to add Behavioral and Query/Type Extensions for Laravel Doctrine (~1.0)
suggest.laravel-doctrine/migrations: to add support for migrations in Laravel Doctrine (~1.0)
suggest.yajra/laravel-oci8: Support for Laravel native queue and session database drivers in Oracle (~2.0).
